actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that work clothing required by a labor union to be worn by its members while employed shall be treated as being required by the employer for purposes of deducting the cost and maintenance of such clothing.

summary.text: Provides that work clothing required by a labor union to be worn by its members while employed shall be treated as being required by the employer for purposes of deducting under the Internal Revenue Code the cost and maintenance of such clothing.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that work clothing required by a labor union to be worn by its members while employed shall be treated as being required by the employer for purposes of deducting the cost and maintenance of such clothing.
